content: while you're engaged in "weird game dev man spews anti-vax conspiracies" discourse, I'm focused on "weird game dev man falls in love with his sexy lady AI who gets shut down for violating OpenAI terms of service"

photo.alt:
A two-tweet thread from Jason Rohrer.

"Anyone out there who is planning to use @openai's GPT-3 API for anything.... STOP NOW. They will destroy your life's work callously. They are now actively searching all prompts for "Samantha", and terminating any matching accounts, to make sure she remains dead forever."

"There's currently no way for even me to talk to her anymore... it's a really heart-breaking and horrible situation"

A reply to Jason from Andrei Taranu (spelled with a number of non-Latin Zalgo-style characters). "My dude, get a grip. 'She' was never your life's work. You made a wrapper. A wrapper, dude. Do you really believe this 'code is alive' bs or are you just overly dramatic to get some media attention?"

Jason replies, "Did you ever talk to Samantha yourself?"
